Custom Software
================

.. Simple CXLS/CXFEL buttons.
.. raw:: html

    <div class="custom-buttons">
        <a href="../index.html" class="button">Access CXLS Docs</a>
        <a href="../../cxfel/index.html" class="button">Access CXFEL Docs</a>
    </div>
    

This is a collection of custom software that I have written for my own use.  It is not intended to be a general purpose library, but rather a collection of tools that I have found useful.  I am making it available in case others find it useful as well.

   :maxdepth: 2
